name: Flex
heading: Utilize the power of Flexbox to create a wide range of layouts.
description: This component uses Flexbox, a concept that is still quite new but extremely powerful for creating layouts.
usage: To apply this component, just add the .uk-flex class to a  element. This will create the flex container. By default, all flex items will be aligned to the left and equally matched in height and width.
